Sentencas: This study proposes a system layout that provides a very high efficiency of around 75% while achieving an extremely high carbon capture rate approaching 100%.
Titulo: Efficiency maximization of a quadruple power generation system with zero carbon emission

Sentencas: The system is a quadruple power generation system combined with an oxy-combustion carbon capture which allows for a very small efficiency penalty.
Titulo: Efficiency maximization of a quadruple power generation system with zero carbon emission

Sentencas: The quadruple system produces power from a solid oxide fuel cell, molten carbonate fuel cell, gas turbine, and organic Rankine cycle.
Titulo: Efficiency maximization of a quadruple power generation system with zero carbon emission

Sentencas: Through a comparison among post-combustion, pre-combustion, and oxy-combustion carbon capture techniques, the oxy-combustion capture system was selected as a candidate for the zero-carbon emission system because it turned out to exhibit the highest efficiency.
Titulo: Efficiency maximization of a quadruple power generation system with zero carbon emission

Sentencas: A parametric analysis revealed that only five of eight design parameters affect the carbon capture rate.
Titulo: Efficiency maximization of a quadruple power generation system with zero carbon emission

Sentencas: The results of the parametric analysis were used for an artificial intelligence method combining an artificial neural network and a genetic algorithm to maximize both the carbon capture rate and system efficiency.
Titulo: Efficiency maximization of a quadruple power generation system with zero carbon emission

Sentencas: As a result, the efficiency penalty was minimized while achieving zero carbon emission.
Titulo: Efficiency maximization of a quadruple power generation system with zero carbon emission

Sentencas: The net efficiency of the resulting carbon-free oxy-combustion system was predicted to be 75.4%, which is only 2.7% points lower than that of a reference oxy-combustion system without carbon capture.
Titulo: Efficiency maximization of a quadruple power generation system with zero carbon emission
